statements: SELECT * FROM fashion_social_media_data;
SELECT brand_name, likes, shares FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE likes > 1000;
SELECT brand_name, social_media_platform FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE shares > 500 ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, post_date FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE likes > 5000 AND comments < 1000 ORDER BY brand_name ASC, post_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC, likes DESC, shares ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT brand_name, social_media_platform, post_date FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT brand_name, social_media_platform, likes, comments FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE social_media_platform = 'Instagram' AND post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT brand_name, social_media_platform, likes, comments, shares FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE brand_name LIKE '%Zara%' AND (likes > 500 OR comments > 50) ORDER BY brand_name ASC;
SELECT brand_name, social_media_platform, post_date, likes FROM fashion_social_media_data WHERE brand_name = 'Gucci' AND (likes >= 1000 AND shares > 100) ORDER BY post_date DESC, likes DESC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts;
SELECT post_text, likes FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE comments > 10;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM BrandSentiment WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT post_id, sentiment_score FROM BrandSentiment ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes > 100 ORDER BY post_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, likes, comments, post_id FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE comments > 50 ORDER BY likes ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes, comments FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY comments DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_text, comments, likes, post_id FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes > 50 AND comments < 20 ORDER BY likes DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT post_id, likes, comments, post_text FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT account_id, platform, followers FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT post_id, account_id, post_content, likes, comments FROM posts WHERE likes > 100;
SELECT post_id, account_id, post_content, posted_at FROM posts ORDER BY posted_at DESC;
SELECT account_id, SUM(followers) AS total_followers FROM social_media_accounts GROUP BY account_id;
SELECT sa.post_id, sa.sentiment_category, sa.sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis sa JOIN posts p ON sa.post_id = p.post_id WHERE p.likes > 50 ORDER BY sa.sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT account_id, followers FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers > 1000 ORDER BY followers DESC;
SELECT sp.account_id, sa.sentiment_score, sa.sentiment_category FROM sentiment_analysis sa INNER JOIN posts sp ON sa.post_id = sp.post_id WHERE sa.sentiment_score >= 0.5;
SELECT account_id, followers, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, followers ASC;
SELECT sa.post_id, COUNT(sa.sentiment_score) AS sentiment_count FROM sentiment_analysis sa GROUP BY sa.post_id HAVING sentiment_count > 2 ORDER BY sentiment_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM fashion_companies;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM fashion_companies;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, post_date FROM social_media_data WHERE company_id = 1;
SELECT sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM consumer_sentiment WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT company_name, company_location FROM fashion_companies;
SELECT * FROM social_media_data ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_text, likes, shares FROM social_media_data WHERE company_id = 1;

SELECT company_name, sentiment_score, sentiment_category FROM fashion_companies JOIN social_media_data ON fashion_companies.company_id = social_media_data.company_id JOIN consumer_sentiment ON social_media_data.post_id = consumer_sentiment.post_id;
SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM fashion_companies JOIN social_media_data ON fashion_companies.company_id = social_media_data.company_id GROUP BY company_name;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 1000;
SELECT post_text, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT hashtag_text FROM hashtags ORDER BY hashtag_text DESC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC
SELECT post_id, post_text, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts WHERE likes_count > 100
SELECT commenter_name, comment_text FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_id DESC
SELECT * FROM hashtags JOIN posts ON hashtags.post_id = posts.post_id
